misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko, a seasoned competitor from Lakeside Golf Vammala, brings a wealth of experience to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Known for his strategic play and calm demeanor, Mikko has become a familiar face at this prestigious event.

Off the course, Mikko is a man of diverse interests, with a penchant for fine wines and classic literature. A true Renaissance man, he enjoys engaging in philosophical debates and is known for his sharp wit and insightful observations.

With Hector Trophée 2025 marking Mikko's eleventh appearance, his determination to capture the coveted title remains as strong as ever. This year, he hopes to leverage his vast experience at the Hector Trophée to finally put his name on the trophy.
A man who has planted his seeds in four different women across four decades, Mikko's life is as rich and varied as his golf game.
